import React, { Component } from "react" import { Button, Form, Grid, Header, Message, Segment } from "semantic-ui-react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" export default class LoginForm extends Component { state = { username: "", password: "" } handleLoginSubmit = () => { } handleLoginChange = e => { const targetValue = e.target.value const targetName = e.target.name this.setState({ [targetName]: targetValue }) } render() { console.log(this.state) return (
Login
Create Account )
) } }
